attributes.additional_details: In 2 years time, GCSEs will change so that instead of them being spread out between year 10 and year 11, they will all take place at the end of year 11. This is bad as GCSE students will have more stress on them, they need to revise ALOT LONGER to make sure they remember everything, current year 8 students will be in the transition period (so they will be like guinea pigs) and Teachers may not be well prepared for it. Please sign and myself and other students will be grateful!
